concept.title: Friend Mentions
concept.shortdesc: @mention a user, or someone who has already posted content into the Collection.

conbody.p: To mention someone who has posted content into the Collection, users may click the @ mention button, or type @ into the editor to display a list of people available for mention. The list will include all users who are following the conversation. (Start typing a name to limit the list to matches for the input text.)
conbody.note: Users who are @replied do not receive notification of the post.
conbody.p: The friend tagging function is not available on mobile, and is not available on IE8 or earlier.
